alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 25 at 8:30AM EST until January 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/. * At 829 AM EST/729 AM CST/, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles south of Blountstown, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, including the following locations... Marysville, Telogia, Rock Bluff, Estiffanulga, Bristol, Woods, Hosford and Lowry. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
